Title: Note on Podosphaera xanthii in Viet Nam
Abstract:
Podosphaera xanthii “Complex- species” damage on six
various host plant families including seven main crops (bitter melon
(Mormordica charantia), cucumber (Cucumis sativus), pumpkin (Cucurbita
pepo), sunflower (Heliathus annus), sweet leaf (Sauropus androgynus),
hot chili (Capsicum frutescens), tomato (Solanum lycopersicum), three
medicinal plants (false dairy (Eclipta postrate), grass dairy (Euphorbia
thymifolia), scoparia weed (Scoparia dulcis), five weeds (indian
heliotrope (Heliotropium indicum), hairy beggars stick (Bidens pilosa),
bellyache bush (Jatropha gossypifolia), camapu (Physalis angulata),
ash-colored fleabane (Vernonia cinerea L.) and one fence plant (Red bird
flower (Euphorbia tithymaloides)).
